questions.question: What does HTTPS stand for and why is it important?
questions.answer: HyperText Transfer Protocol Secure - encrypts data in transit

questions.question: What is a common method hackers use to trick users into revealing sensitive information?
What type of attack involves overwhelming a server with traffic to make it unavailable?
What is the name for a secret code used to encrypt and decrypt data?
What security principle means users should have the minimum privileges needed to perform their job?
